apolloEmail.title: Apollo.io Email
apolloEmail.description: Your Apollo.io account email (free account works!). After first successful login, cookies are saved and login is skipped on subsequent runs.

apolloPassword.title: Apollo.io Password
apolloPassword.description: Your Apollo.io account password. Only needed for first run - cookies will be saved automatically.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Apollo.io URLs to scrape (search results, company profiles, contact pages)

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape per URL (default: 10)

enrichProfiles.title: Enrich Profiles
enrichProfiles.description: Visit each contact's detail page for complete data (slower but more data)

minDelay.title: Minimum Delay (seconds)
minDelay.description: Minimum delay between actions to avoid detection

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration (Optional)
proxyConfiguration.description: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Use RESIDENTIAL proxies only! Apify datacenter proxies are blocked by Apollo. Recommended providers: BrightData, Oxylabs, or use your own residential proxy.
